item.title: Info
item.description: Arrival For international arrivals, Pavia is easily accessible from Milan. The most convenient airport is Milan Linate, connected by metro line M4 to Milano Dateo station, where you can take the S13 suburban train directly to Pavia. You can also use Milan Malpensa airport, taking the Malpensa Express train to Milan Central Station, and from there take a regional train to Pavia. Milan - Bergamo airport is not recommended as it is quite far.
